question_en: Anju was engrossed in reading her book. What is the meaning of engrossed?
question_hi: अंजू अपनी किताब पढ़ने में तल्लीन थी। तल्लीन का मतलब क्या होता है?
correct_answer_en: Focussed or lost in an activity!
